text: Barbara Ann Stuart (née McNeese; January 3, 1930 – May 15, 2011) was an American actress. She played Marianne Danzig in Our Family Honor. She also played Alice in Pete and Gladys ==Early years== Stuart was born Barbara Ann McNeese in Paris, Illinois, which is the seat of Edgar County in eastern Illinois. ==Death== On May 15, 2011, Stuart died in St. George, Utah, at the age of 81. She was survived by a brother and three stepchildren. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:1930 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Barbara Stuart
